txt.en:
'I bid you welcome to Tornhad, [placeholder]. You have my letter, I presume?'

You hand Aelindil the letter you received, and he pockets it.

'You see, Tarneth wrote to me some days ago, and she had much to say of the aid you offered my kinsmen upon the shores of Lake Evendim. I thank you for the part you played in protecting the relics of Annúminas, my friend.

'I might be able to aid you in return, but that depends upon you!'

You have proven yourself among the countless Mariners and Corsairs that sail the waters of Middle-earth, but now you are set on a new course: to test your skill and master the Sea itself, if you might.

[placeholder],

Word of your prowess has spread among the Dúnedain, and so, I have arranged for you an audience with a visiting Mariner of great experience and skill. However, you must first prove yourself worthy of his tutelage, and that will be no simple task. I await you at Tornhad in the Angle of Mitheithel.

Aelindil
Mariner: The Greatest Journey is Mastery
Bring the letter to Aelindil in Tornhad
Aelindil can be found at Tornhad, in the Angle of Mitheithel.\n\nYou have received a letter from Aelindil, a Mariner of the Dúnedain, who wishes to speak with you.
